filename: Create quality control parameters and testing protocols.md

- Outline key milestones (scaling, new markets) - Integrate commercialization, R&D, marketing plans - Align roadmap with financial projections

- Compare corporation vs. LLC vs. other forms - Consider tax, funding, IP protection implications - Consult legal and finalize decision
- Map out setup, testing, data collection phases - Assign responsibilities and deadlines - Include contingencies for delays
- Gather early feedback from labs or pilot runs - Document success stories/results - Incorporate into marketing and investor pitches
- Articulate how our product solves detection challenges - Emphasize accuracy, efficiency, compliance benefits - Use messaging in marketing materials
